name: Polar Bear 3D Simulator
description:
POLAR BEAR 3D SIMULATOR and ultimate fun and amazing simulator experience.
Wild Bear is angry and running to catch apple for his partner who is stone and need Magical Orbs. Help Bear Catch Orbs and Free his partner.

You need to make Bear run faster before his power runs out. Catch apples and boost your energy. Once you have collected the magical orbs, you need to rush towards the Bear partner so she can get free.

WOW! time is short and Bear is getting angry. He wants you to move him fast and catch orbs for his partner.
